name: KAKURETA - 006 (Evilmon)
description:
KAKURETA is a unique EVILMON. KAKURETA is the mask of Scout ??????, fused with 3 EVIL. 
A second artefact remaining of the Scouts tragedy, after EXCAL.
The mask channeled EVIL power to achieve a second victory over the legion of ??????.


The mask became sentient and started talking to the wearer's mind, suggesting to create new artefacts.
Scout ?????? had to stop wearing the mask but kept it for his whole life.

Before disappearing, KAKURETA revealed the EVIL seed phrase to Scout ??????.
The seed phrase allowed Scout ?????? to access the EVIL chain.


KAKURETA is now missing, some people say that it is now owned by a rich EVIL collector.

KAKURETA has been airsummoned to every wallet that owns H=N.Mask.1, H=N.Mask.2 or H=N.Mask.3 by Anderlaxe, and to every wallet holding at least 0.666 $EVIL on Monday, 30th of August, 2021.

KAKURETA is a level II EVILMON.
KAKURETA can evolve.

KAKURETA art has been made by Anderlaxe

https://twitter.com/Anderlaxe
hen.link/Anderlaxe
